oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fairness in the organic food chain – practical experiences from Bio Suisse
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schumacher, Jörg
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
Produce chain management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the last years Suisse has introduced a fairness strategy to enhance trade relations between organic market partners in supply chains within Switzerland. A code of conduct was elaborated, round table discussions on fairness issues were initiated between market partners and a fairness survey was conducted to evaluate the current level of fairness in trade relations. Results are satisfying but also show future challenges.
